lines.text: [the crazed doctor is restricted to an iron lung]
If I can't breathe like everyone else, then I'm gonna make everyone else breathe like me.

[explaining the shape shifting of the car]
The atoms change at a molecular level.

[a homeless man holds the clothes of Black Scorpion]
Do you mind if I take those?
No. I'll just keep lookin' for the naked lady.
